trans-unit.target: Successful recovery is in sight! Keep heart as you complete your respective missions!
We thank and congratulate all for an efficient recovery. The red alert has been lifted.
Recovery is assured─the red alert has been lifted. Return to your posts, everyone. Initiative command will take care of the rest.

Current chains
●メカミッション:壁をぶっ壊せ!
●メカミッション:隕石を受け止めろ！
●メカミッション:ルナテンダーを追いかけろ
●メカミッション:邪魔なキノコを掃除せよ
●メカミッション:鉱石を取得せよ
Operation commenced! Vacuum suit pilots, bring your arsenal to bear and destroy those corrupted crystals!
The mission is to destroy a massive cluster of corrupted crystals and secure the remnants for processing and repurposing.
The crystals themselves are highly durable, but no match for a well-equipped vacuum suit!
Upon arrival, stand by for operation commencement. Take care not to stray from your objective.
Ground support team, thank you for contributing! Use your astrodrills to destroy corrupted crystals!
New targets detected. Pilots, remain vigilant!
Fifty percent completion. At this rate, we'll reach our material requisition targets with ease!
Operation ninety percent complete. Contributors, maintain your focus!
A thorough success, and all thanks to our pilots and ground support team!
Operation failed... Contributors, return to your regular duties. We shall have to meet our targets on another occasion.
●目標に到達だ！ これよりボーナスタイムに突入するぞ！
●メカの「●発破」が連打できるようになり、 お手伝いは「●範囲収集：大」を いつでも使えるようになるぞ。
●ジャンジャン石を集めて、 「●プレイヤー貢献度」を稼いでくれ！
●目標に到達だ！ みんな、協力ありがとう。
●残念ながら●ボーナスタイムは発生しなかったが、 作戦は成功だ！
●報酬を受け取っておのおのの活動に戻ってくれ。 またの参加を期待している！
●ボーナスタイム終了！ 作戦は大成功だ、みんな協力ありがとう。
●報酬を受け取っておのおのの活動に戻ってくれ。 またの参加を期待している！
We've detected signs of an astromagnetic storm... Stay alert for any adverse effects on our equipment.
Red alert! Our equipment has been compromised by the storm. All initiative personnel are requested to deliver supplies for the recovery effort!
Lighting in Piercingway Tunnel has been partially repaired. Continue your efforts to restore the tunnel's luminance!
Piercingway Tunnel shines almost as brightly as before! Complete restoration is within arm's reach!
Our mission is to clear a bed of toxic spongoi before its effusions poison the area.
Use your warp loaders to destroy the irregular spongoi─our mechs should be up to the task.
Upon arrival, all personnel should stand by for operation commencement. Take care not to stray from your objective.
Operation commenced! Pilots, clear away the largest of the spongoi!
Ground support, burn away the minor filaments!
New targets have been confirmed. Pilots, stay alert!
Completion at fifty percent and counting. Keep it up!
Ninety percent completion! Just a little further, everyone!
Operation successful! Our most heartfelt thanks to all active personnel!
Operation failed... All personnel, return to your duties. We shall regroup and begin anew...
Thanks to the efforts of all, the Moongate Hub has been successfully expanded!<var 17 /var>Please check the Infrastructure Index for Reportingway's latest log entry!
Wonderful news, everyone! We have at long last established the Cosmoliner!<var 17 /var>Please enjoy Reportingway's insightful commentary in the Infrastructure Index!
Our habitation modules are now habitable! Next, we set our sights upon building the cosmoport...<var 17 /var>Check the Infrastructure Index for the next available project!
Our progress continues to make leaps and bounds thanks to all of your hard work!<var 17 /var>Please enjoy Reportingway's account of our cosmoport and habitation module construction!
Our mech hangar has been enhanced in a most practical and charming fashion!<var 17 /var>Read all about it in the Infrastructure Index!
The northwestern radius of the Cosmoliner is finally complete!<var 17 /var>Feel free to peruse the Infrastructure Index and read Reportingway's commentary!
I bring glad tidings! The southeastern radius of the Cosmoliner is ready for use!<var 17 /var>Please refer to the Infrastructure Index for the relevant log entry!
Tunnel excavation progress has reached fifty percent! We now prepare for the second phase of the endeavor.<var 17 /var>Consult the Infrastructure Index for the next available project!
Thanks to our industrious excavation crew, Piercingway Tunnel is complete!<var 17 /var>I heartily recommend you read Reportingway's account in the Infrastructure Index!
With much flair and a keen eye for detail, Reportingway has summarized the grand opening of the Cosmoliner's southwestern radius!<var 17 /var>See the Infrastructure Index for the latest log entry!
Everyone's diligent work has wrought astounding advancements upon our Moongate Hub!<var 17 /var>Don't forget to read Reportingway's latest log entry via the Infrastructure Index!

The energization station is now operational, which means the fulfilment of our energy needs in perpetuity, if not longer!<var 17 /var>Further opportunities will be listed in the Infrastructure Index─including those pertaining to the planned hydrofication station!
And with that, another utility project draws to a thoroughly successful close!<var 17 /var>To read Reportingway's riveting account, simply refer to the Infrastructure Index!
Well done, everyone! With our mech hangar looking better than ever, we once more seek to improve the cosmoport!<var 17 /var>Don't forget to check the Infrastructure Index for the latest projects!

Thanks to everyone's unwavering support, our mech hangar and cosmoport have reached the apex of their development!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has immortalized all in the Infrastructure Index, so be sure to give it a read!

I am delighted to report that roughly half of our new lift has been completed!<var 17 /var>As we enter our second wave of projects, we encourage all participants to check the Infrastructure Index for the next lucrative opportunity!

The nadir lift is officially operational! Thank you from the bottom of my heart─if you'll pardon the pun!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has recorded our endeavors with far more aplomb, so be sure to check the Infrastructure Index's latest log!
Fantastic news, everyone! The subterranean radius of the Cosmoliner is officially complete!<var 17 /var>Please do check the Infrastructure Index for the latest log entry!

Allow me to draw your attention to the marvelous─the magnificent─Lunar Hopopolis! With this great leap, our expansion of lunar infrastructure is now complete!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has written a most moving installment in the Infrastructure Index. Please take a moment to relax and reflect on all your hard work!
A meteor shower draws near! Impacts may occur in Sinus Ardorum, so we advise all to remain vigilant!
A sharp rise of spores in the air has been detected. Circumstances permitting, we recommend all workers halt operations for the time being.
Red alert! The astromagnetic storm has impacted operations across Sinus Ardorum. All available personnel are requested to aid in the recovery effort!
Red alert! A meteor shower has passed over the Moongate Hub. We require personnel to assess and repair any damage!
Red alert! Gas leak due to meteor impact detected! Damage assessment requested at once!
Red alert! Sporing mist detected in the eastern sector of Sinus Ardorum! We request inspection of the area for the presence of irregular spongoi!
Red alert! Sporing mist detected in the eastern sector of Sinus Ardorum! We request the eradication of harmful spongoi in the area!
Deposit what shards you can into our field scanners. They are essential to this mission's success!
Deposit the charred remains into our field scanners for further analysis. We'll have the lay of the land yet!
We have all we need to complete recovery efforts! Any free artisans are encouraged to continue replenishing our stores of supplies!
We have enough materials to repair the tunnel's lighting! We ask that any available hands refocus their efforts on replenishing lost supplies to the west of the Moongate Hub.
The lost supplies have been replenished. Any able hands should aid in procuring supplies for repairing the tunnel's lighting.
We have collected sufficient amounts of aether. We ask that any available personnel work towards recovering the drones in the northern sector.
The lost drones have been found! We ask any available workers to help collect aether to the south of the Moongate Hub.
Removal and recovery of the meteorites appear to be successful. Those who are able are asked to aid in procuring materials for the rover repair in the northern sector.
We have enough to finish repairs on the rover. Our artisans should now aid in removing meteorite debris to the southwest of the Moongate Hub.
We have sufficient materials to stop the gas leak. Now, we ask that all available prioritize delivering relief supplies for those affected.
We have enough supplies to treat those affected by the leakage. Any free hands should assist with stopping the leak from causing further damage.
With this we can finally exterminate the irregular spongoi. Proceed with gathering samples so we might discern the effects of the mist.
We have sufficient samples to proceed with analyzing the effects of the mist. Proceed to the south of Weddingway's Bower and assist with the extermination of the spongoi.
We now have everything we need to burn away the mutant cacti. Any available personnel are asked to aid with processing spongoi in the eastern sector.
We finally have enough samples of the spongoi. Next, proceed with aiding in the extermination of mutant cacti.
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required in the southern sector of Sinus Ardorum and to the west of the Moongate Hub!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required to the north of the Moongate Hub and at the rock slide to the south!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required to the southwest and north of the Moongate Hub!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required at the lunar nadir!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required to the north of the Moongate Hub and in the southeastern sector of Sinus Ardorum!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required in the eastern sector of Sinus Ardorum!
The tunnel is looking better than ever, and the rovers are almost up and running. We can never have too many supplies in reserve, though, so keep the deliveries coming.
I'm impressed with how quickly you've recovered the aether and fallen drones! We always need reserve supplies, so the initiative would be grateful for any additional deliveries!
Barely a meteor in sight, and the rovers are almost all back in order! Of course, we wouldn't begrudge anyone who wants to keep working on the initiative's behalf!
Thanks to everyone's efforts, damage from the leaking gas has been contained! Of course, we would happily accept any more supplies you could deliver!
The mutant spores are mostly ash, and we've received enough samples to begin analyzing the sporing mist. We could always use reserve supplies, however, so please deliver whatever you can!
The mutant organisms have been thoroughly decimated, and we have plenty of samples on hand. However, any further deliveries to bolster reserves would be greatly appreciated!
A mass of giant corrupted crystals has been detected near the Scream Puff.
We must destroy the crystals and recoup the remnants for use in our endeavors!
Vacuum suits will be deployed to undertake the work. Willing pilots, please apply without delay!
A bed of toxic spongoi has been detected near the Mush-room.
Left unchecked, the spores may affix to our equipment and greatly hinder our expedition's progress.
We plan to deploy warp loaders to combat this threat. Prospective pilots, submit your applications!
The Saltpeter Shore boasts plentiful deposits of phainite. Our mission is to gather this precious resource.
Pilots, be advised that your mechs must absorb sufficient ionic energy before excavation can be attempted.
Once you are prepared to dig, approach the pits of quicksand and get to work. Good luck.
Operation commenced! Pilots, charge your mechs with ionic energy before mining the phainite!
Ground support team, your contribution is greatly appreciated! Use your astrodrills to gather what phainite you can.
Our field scanners will analyze your findings and provide essential data to our pilots.
The field scanners have detected a spike in ionic energy! Pilots, now is the time to charge your mechs!
Fifty percent of phainite acquisition complete. At this rate, we may well exceed our initial estimates!
Ninety percent of phainite acquisition complete! Keep up the excellent work!
A successful operation, one that greatly aids the initiative's work on Phaenna. You have our thanks.
Operation failed... We shall regroup and try again later.
Our mission is the procurement of resources from the Chillmark. The glass here will likely be an indispensable asset for the initiative.
Our warp loaders are equipped with specialized mechanisms for fracturing all manner of ores. Pilot them, shatter the nearby glass clusters, and collect the spoils.
Once you arrive at the designated area and our preparations are complete, the mission shall begin in earnest. Be mindful not to stray too far from the mission zone!
Operation commenced! Pilots, the glass clusters are yours for the breaking!
To those of you on foot, I ask that you salvage resources from the piles of debris scattered about the area.
Glass fragments should be promptly delivered to the field scanner. Your aid shall be a boon to our pilots!
The field scanners detect hidden targets! Pilots, if you find them, shatter them as well!
Glass fragment collection at fifty percent! We may end up with a surplus at this rate!
Glass fragment collection at ninety percent─excellent! A surplus is all but certain.
A great success! Your diligent contributions will doubtless make a world of difference. My thanks to all pilots and participants for their efforts!
Alas, the mission is a failure... But take heart─your efforts have not gone unnoticed, and I thank you for them.
We're almost through the worst of it! Keep heart and attend to your respective missions!
We thank everyone for their contributions to our success. The red alert has been lifted.
Our crisis has been resolved, and the red alert has been lifted. Initiative command will take care of the rest, so everyone is encouraged to return to their posts.
We have more than enough supplies now, but any extra hands, paws, or hand-like paws are encouraged to replenish our reserves!
We expect violent thunderstorms to arrive over the area of operations. Be prepared to suspend critical tasks or risk damage to our equipment.
The annealing winds will be here soon. Stay vigilant for any unexpected trouble caused by the extreme cold.
Dense clouds of aether are on the way, and that means glass rain is to be expected. For the time being, be mindful of wind direction during your work.
Severe thunderstorm above the Glassblown Grotto! <bzzzt> We ask that any available personnel aid in repairing the...<bzzzt>...ing electrical malfunctions!
Red alert! Extremely violent thunderstorms have been detected covering an area extending northwest from central Millefiori!
Red alert: anomalies detected in the northern sector of Phaenna! All available personnel, report to the incident sites at once!
Red alert! Rapidly dropping temperatures have given rise to anomalies across Phaenna! The initiative requires the aid of all available workers!
Glass rain has caused damage in Capsule Chasm. Report to the site and replenish our dwindling supplies!
Heavy glass rain has damaged our facilities across Phaenna! We request aid in procuring supplies for the recovery effort!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required in the northeastern sector of Phaenna!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required in an area expanding northwest from Millefiori!
Red alert! Emergency operations are required at the Lehr and the Slumping Plunge!
Red alert! Emergency operations are required at the Iridized Rise and the descent to Capsule Chasm!
Red alert! Emergency deliveries are required at Capsule Chasm!
Glass rain has damaged facilities in the western and southern sectors of Phaenna! Report to the sites to aid in repair efforts!
Thanks to everyone's diligent efforts, the red alert will soon be lifted. Reserve supplies are to be delivered to the depot near Glassblowers' Beacon.
Our crisis is as good as solved thanks to everyone's hard work. Reserve supplies are to be delivered to Millefiori or the Saltpeter Shore.
The crisis has passed thanks to your hard work. Deliver reserve supplies to the sites in the northern sector.
If you have reserve supplies to deliver, bring them to the Iridized Rise or the eastern sector of Millefiori.
Seems our problems in Capsule Chasm are all but solved. However, we'd be happy to accept any and all deliveries of reserve supplies.
Our problems in the western and southern sectors of Phaenna will soon be no more. Deliveries of reserve supplies are always welcome, though.
We have enough supplies to complete repairs. Any free hands are encouraged to help getting the rovers running.
We'll have the rovers up and running soon enough. Any willing workers should help repairing the damaged machinery.
We've nearly set up all the lightning rods we need. Proceed to the Saltpeter Shore to help with testing the electricity storage system.
We have enough data to finish our testing on the electricity storage system. Please aid with setting up the lightning rods if you're able.
We've gathered enough glass for now. We encourage you to report to the Slumping Plunge as soon as you're able.
The hazardous protrusions are nearly gone─good work. We ask that you aid in gathering glass at the Lehr.
We'll soon have more than enough rare plants and research samples. We ask that you lend your skills towards the installation of the lightning transmission facilities.
The new lightning transmission facilities will be up and running without a hitch. Any free workers should help gather rare plant life and research samples.
The area around the Cosmoliner is almost completely free of glass dust. Any workers with the requisite skills are requested to help with the water survey.
We have all we need to finish our survey of the water. The willing and able are asked to help cleaning up the glass dust.
The rovers are almost all back in tip-top shape. We ask that any free workers help repair the damage at the mobilization station.
I'd say the mobilization station is as good as repaired. Next, we ask that any able help get the rovers back in form.
Your mech has enough ionic energy to begin mining!
Approach a quicksand pit, target the center, and tow in what phainite you can!
An excellent discovery! Well done!

The enhancements to Glassblowers' Beacon are ready at last, and now exploration of Phaenna can begin in earnest.<var 17 /var>This malmstone could not have been achieved without everyone's steadfast support!<var 17 /var>Please peruse the Infrastructure Index for Reportingway's insightful account of the project!

We are pleased to announce that the Cosmoliner has been established near Glassblowers' Beacon!<var 17 /var>With it, our researchers and workers can zip across Phaenna with ease!<var 17 /var>Read all about Reportingway's impression of this exciting development in the Infrastructure Index!

Our habitation modules are now ready for inhabitants!<var 17 /var>Nothing quite equals the feel of a soft bed after a hard day's work!<var 17 /var>Details on the next available project can be found in the Infrastructure Index!

Our energization station is up and running!<var 17 /var>By converting ambient aether into energy, it will allow us to explore further than ever before!<var 17 /var>Check the Infrastructure Index for information on future projects─namely, a brand-new hydrofication station!

It is my pleasure to announce that the hydrofication station is fully operational!<var 17 /var>Thanks to all those involved, we now have a stable supply of that most glorious of life-sustaining liquids─water!<var 17 /var>As always, Reportingway's scintillating account is available on the Infrastructure Index!

Excellent work, everyone! The storage capabilities of the mech hangar have been duly enhanced!<var 17 /var>We hope these improvements underpin the ongoing success of our mechanized workforce.<var 17 /var>Be sure to browse the Infrastructure Index for a full account!

Rejoice, for the Cosmoliner has expanded in magnificent fashion!<var 17 /var>Thanks to our contributors, journey times between the northwest and south will be greatly reduced!<var 17 /var>Refer to the Infrastructure Index to read Reportingway's engaging account!

Progress on the Appliqué Crane has reached the halfway mark!<var 17 /var>With the chasm floor almost within reach, we now ready ourselves for the second phase of the endeavor.<var 17 /var>Consult the Infrastructure Index for the next available project!

Thanks to one and all, the Appliqué Crane is now fully operational!<var 17 /var>At long last, we have reached the base of the chasm! It's so mysterious down here, I'm brimming with excitement!<var 17 /var>Be sure to check the Infrastructure Index to read Reportingway's account!

I'm pleased to announce that Chasmwind Filigree is now accessible via the Cosmoliner!<var 17 /var>Now that transport has grown more convenient, it seems the research teams will soon begin their field study in earnest!<var 17 /var>As ever, Reportingway has scribed a gripping account of your efforts, should you wish to give it a read!

Thanks to everyone's hard work, Glassblowers' Beacon is now even further enhanced!<var 17 /var>With the structural adjustments to the center of the base, it's never felt more comfortable! I can't wait to see how it develops alongside our exploratory efforts!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has rendered a splendiferous account of the efforts that went into this project in the Infrastructure Index!

Thank you, my fellows, for your amazing augmentations to the mech hangar!<var 17 /var>Refined glass is truly a wondrous building material, both in functionality and beauty!<var 17 /var>Kindly refer to the Infrastructure Index for particulars on the latest projects!

Our renovated cosmoport is fully operational! Thank you for all your support.<var 17 /var>With the power stations we installed, charging our starship will take but two fluffs of a Loporrit's tail!<var 17 /var>We'll be flying off to distant stars in no time, but for now, be sure to check the Infrastructure Index for upcoming projects.

Thanks to your hard work, a grand megapower panel now stands to the south.<var 17 /var>Just think of all the light it will convert into energy! In fact...I think we need one more!<var 17 /var>Construction on a second panel will commence shortly in the west. Check the Infrastructure Index for details!

Our two megapower panels have energy enough between them to fuel all our dreams on Phaenna!<var 17 /var>Now, you needn't worry if charging your exotablet will cause your neighbor's lights to go out!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has documented what your efforts have accomplished. Be sure to give it a read!

Our brand-new mobilization station is ready to go!<var 17 /var>The drones we house there will be instrumental to our upcoming mission. Care to guess what it is?<var 17 /var>An epic attempt to cool a crater of molten glass! Our drones are already hard at work─check the Infrastructure Index to see when we'll be calling for contributors!

Our battle with the molten glass is won! ...Well, half-won, to be specific.<var 17 /var>Worry not─the drones' cooling capabilities will maintain our current progress as we broaden our horizons!<var 17 /var>With half the Vent solidifed, we shall soon commence the second phase of Operation Chilling-a-Way! See the Infrastructure Index for the finer details!

We've done it, everyone! Fusingway Vent is completely cooled!<var 17 /var>Rest assured, the area shall remain gloriously glassy from here on out!<var 17 /var>Should you wish to read a more thorough account, Reportingway has recorded our latest accomplishments for your perusal.

Now that's what I call a Cosmoliner route! With it, our network on Phaenna is complete!<var 17 /var>From Glassblowers' Beacon to Fusingway Vent, the star is now yours to conveniently explore!<var 17 /var>I've received word of a freshly published installment from Reportingway, as well! Why not give the Infrastructure Index a read?

Behold! The Stellascope at Glassblowers' Beacon is finally complete...as is our work on Phaenna! Our next hop forward awaits.<var 17 /var>I offer my sincerest gratitude to all initiative volunteers─we couldn't have done it without you!<var 17 /var>Reportingway's just finished recording this monumental malmstone as well, in case you'd like to reflect on our incredible progress!
Concentrations of ionic energy have been detected on the Saltpeter Shore.
We must act quickly to harness this power for the extraction of a volcanic glass called “phainite.”
Pilots will be asked to man vacuum suits for mining purposes. Candidates, submit your applications via your exotablets!
Geothermal fluctuations in the Chillmark have triggered eruptions of giant glass clusters.
Tests indicate these shards are incredibly pure, and therefore vital for developing our precision instruments.
We will be deploying warp loaders to shatter the crystals and collect the fragments. Prospective pilots, please submit your applications!
Our new Garlean warmachina are standing by for deployment, equipped with re-engineered weaponry for the mission at hand.
The mech's wide-range plasmic disruptor can negate multiple small anomalies at once, but is less effective against the larger gravity spheres.
Engage the mech's nova grenade to dissipate these bigger targets. While energy inefficient, the potent blast guarantees results!
Operation commenced! Dissipate all gravity spheres in the field!
Thank you for joining our ground support team! Use your grav rammer to dissipate the subterranean gravity spheres!
There will be no field scanners deployed for this operation. Devote all your efforts to resolving the gravitational distortions!
Our readings indicate that the region's gravity has returned to normal─the operation was a success! Our thanks to all pilots and participants for their efforts!
Operation failed... All personnel, return to your regular duties.
A large-scale gravitational fluctuation has been detected in the vicinity of the Long-lost Carrot. Left unchecked, the effects on the region could be disastrous.
In order to resolve these dangerous distortions, our mech hangar has been expanded with repurposed Garlean warmachina capable of directly dissipating the anomalies.
These new mechs will be crucial to completing the operation. Prospective pilots, submit your applications!
What we call “floatstones” are rocks charged with anti-gravitational energies. They have been freed from the ground and are currently hovering in midair due to a localized anomaly.
The mech you pilot has been re-engineered for this mission, allowing you to use its new and improved ionic turboblaster to collect and condense the spherical floatstones.
Should the opportunity arise, we would also like you to attempt retrieval of the colossal stones floating high above the field. Further instructions to follow!
Operation commenced! Gather all exposed floatstones!
Thank you for joining our ground support team! Your mission is to collect the smaller floatstones!
Assist with mech target acquisition by delivering all gathered resources to the field scanners!
The field scanners have located a floatstone of enormous mass in the skies above!
Resource acquisition is at fifty percent. At this rate, we can expect to exceed our mission quota!
Resource acquisition now at ninety percent. One last push, everyone!
Operation successful! All contributing personnel are to be commended for surpassing our projected estimates!
Operation failed... All personnel, return to your regular duties.
A gravitational anomaly has been detected in Cape Geras!
The fluctuations have overcharged the floatstones in the area, causing them to break free of the ground and hover in midair.
The conditions are perfect for our mechs to gather this resource in mass quantities. Prospective pilots, submit your applications!
We are close to resolving the issue at hand! Keep heart and attend to your respective missions!
We thank everyone for contributing to a successful resolution! The red alert has been lifted.
As a resolution to the current issue is now in sight, the red alert has been lifted. Please return to your posts and leave the remaining tasks to initiative command.
Thanks to your combined efforts, we have all the supplies we require. Available contributors are nevertheless encouraged to continue delivering surplus materials.
Severe gravity fluctuations detected! All personnel are instructed to remain vigilant and brace for unpredictable weightlessness.
Gravity fluctuations detected over the southern seas! Exploration zone personnel are warned to expect bubble bloom conditions.
Approach of Progenitrix-level extreme low pressure front confirmed! Gale-force winds expected. Exploration zone personnel are advised to take shelter.
立盾の壁を中心に、大規模な乱重力が発生した！ 緊急状況を発令、各員に協力を要請する！
ケープ・ゲーラス一帯で海水が浮かび、水泡嵐が発生している。 稀少資源確保のため、各員に緊急作業を依頼したい！
強い突風により、リフティング・レグ周辺で事故が発生！ 緊急状況を宣言、貴君らに協力を要請する。
強い突風により、基地北部の広域にて被害が生じている。 緊急状況を宣言、現地での協力を依頼したい！
立盾の壁を中心に、大規模な乱重力が発生中！ 必要物資の調達が急務である、現地に向かってくれたまえ。
極束の浜と、先駆者のオアシスにて水泡嵐が発生中。 稀少資源確保のため、各員に緊急作業を依頼したい！
強い突風により、リフティング・レグ周辺で事故が発生！ 対応作業に、是非とも協力してほしい！
ロングロスト・キャロット南部にて緊急状況発生中。 また、リフティング・レグでも負傷者が出たため、協力を求む！
各員の貢献により、緊急状況解決の目途が立った。 予備物資は引き続き、立盾の壁で引き取るぞ。
各員の貢献により、必要な稀少資源が十分に確保できた。 予備物資は引き続き、ケープ・ゲーラス付近で引き取るぞ。
各員の貢献により、緊急状況解決の目途が立った。予備物資は引き続き、リフティング・レグ周辺で引き取ろう！
ロングロスト・キャロットおよび、リフティング・レグにて、 予備物資の納入を受け付けており、状況は無事解決の見込みだ。
Emergency measures at the Shielding Wall are proceeding apace. The willing and able are encouraged to contribute supplies at the depository north of Terra Firma.
The depository north of Terra Firma has collected sufficient supplies. The willing and able are encouraged to assist with the efforts at the Shielding Wall.
The researchers at the Foregone Oasis have met their gathering objectives. The willing and able are encouraged to assist with procuring resources at the Sound Pole.
It is reported that a sufficient amount of rare resources has been amassed at the Sound Pole. The willing and able are encouraged to assist with the harvesting efforts at the Foregone Oasis.

The response to the accident which took place at Falsifying Wall has been efficient and thorough. The willing and able are encouraged to move on to the Megalithopolis and lend a hand with the downed drone incident.

The incident which occurred east of the Megalithopolis is now largely under control. The willing and able are encouraged to respond to calls for assistance from the accident site at the Falsifying Wall.
Workers attending to the rockfall debris report that the job is mostly complete. The willing and able are encouraged to contribute to the medical supply depository on the Regolift.
The critical shortage of emergency medical supplies has been duly resolved. The willing and able are encouraged to turn their energies to the tasks waiting at the Long-lost Carrot.
Construction on the habitation modules is set to begin shortly! If you've been daydreaming about honest-to-goodness housing, your time is nigh!

Excellent news for those of you roughing it on the cold, hard ground─the habitation modules are complete!<var 17 /var>Thank you all for your support! The ruins will serve nicely as our base... I daresay Oizys is feeling homier already!<var 17 /var>If you'd prefer a more detailed account, fear not! Reportingway and the Infrastructure Index are on the case.
We're devising a central Cosmoliner concept─but the best-laid plans of Loporrit and man require materials and stellar missions!
You supplied <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> demanded it, so the central Cosmoliner construction is underway! Your patience until its completion is much appreciated.

Stop on by the central Cosmoliner circuit, because it's ready for action!<var 17 /var>Travel around the base should no longer pose an issue...and for those inquiring about more stations, yes! We hear you!<var 17 /var>Reportingway has archived our latest feat in the Infrastructure Index, so don't hesitate to give it a read!
Our vital infrastructure won't materialize from nowhere! If you crave rechargeable exotablets and potable water, why not aid our supply efforts with stellar missions?
Do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> thirst for power? Then I've got great news─energization station construction shall soon begin! Hop over and help us out when the time comes!

Say good-bye to candlelight and dead exotablets─the energization station is complete! Thanks to you all, power outages here will be a thing of the past!<var 17 /var>With a means to convert environmental aether into energy, we'll have enough to permanently power the base!<var 17 /var>Next, we set our sights on another much-needed resource: the hydrofication station! But for now, the newest Infrastructure Index entry is available for your perusal!

Let there be water─the hydrofication station is complete, thanks to your collective efforts!<var 17 /var>With your help, we've also established a nearby lab for Dylise! We implore you to drop by with any Oizys-related inquiries you might have!<var 17 /var>If you missed out on construction, worry not! Reportingway has composed a rousing summary in the Infrastructure Index.

Within the floating rock formations to the southeast lie unknown minerals and potential keys to unlocking Oizys's secrets!<var 17 /var>By manipulating the star's anomalous gravity and stabilizing the stones from the Unmoored Anchor, we could forge a floating bridge to guide us to Shadefleet!<var 17 /var>Now, if we want to make <var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> of that a reality, we'll need your supplies and support, so I hope you're ready for some stellar missions!
Gravitational generator construction is nearly ready to begin! Join us, and help defy the laws of physics beyond reasoning! Yes, you heard that right!

Our gravitational generators are complete, and with them, the buoyant bridge to Shadefleet!<var 17 /var>Detailed surveys of the region are bound to give us additional insight on Oizys's gravitational anomalies.<var 17 /var>If you wish to further appreciate the project's resounding success, Reportingway has composed a thrilling synopsis for the Infrastructure Index!
We're conceptualizing a Cosmoliner extension to Shadefleet! With your─yes, <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var>─stellar mission contributions, anything is possible!
It's happening, fellow colleagues! The Cosmoliner extension to Shadefleet is underway as we speak! I'll alert you all as soon as it's completed!

From here on out, we'll be zipping through Shadefleet in style─the Cosmoliner extension is complete!<var 17 /var>On behalf of those who can now pursue more efficient surveys on the area, I thank all contributors for their efforts!<var 17 /var>And remember: if you happened to miss out on the action, Reportingway has once again immortalized our progress in the Infrastructure Index!

Our researchers hypothesize that the broken crystalline apparatus at Terra Firma─the Euhedron, it's called─was once a grand computing device!<var 17 /var>Were we to reactivate it, we could uncover crucial knowledge on the star's previous residents! Thus, we plan to restore it along with the base!<var 17 /var>Restoration will be no easy feat, and we'll need as many supplies as we can muster...but I am confident you are all up to the task!

We shall soon be performing essential maintenance on Terra Firma to connect our energization stations to the base!<var 17 /var>We'll have much to do when work begins in earnest, so hop on over if you've the time!

Thanks to everyone's <var 1A 02 /var>firm<var 1A 01 /var> belief in our vision, Terra Firma's renewal is complete! We must now focus our efforts on full restoration of the Euhedron.<var 17 /var>Access to its records would allow us a window into Oizys's distant past... Oooh, just imagining the possibilities has me hopping for joy!<var 17 /var>...Ahem! Anyroad, Reportingway has added yet another entry to the Infrastructure Index. You won't want to miss it!

Here's an Oizys fact for you─were you aware that the Euhedron crystal is exceedingly rare and found only on this star?<var 17 /var>Unfortunately, its once-sparkling surfaces have dulled with the passage of time...to recover its crystalline gleam, we'll need to infuse it with plenty of aether!<var 17 /var>Your stellar mission contributions will be key to these next steps, so we'll be counting on you all!

Have you an appreciation for massive, luminous crystalline structures from a bygone age? If you answered “yes,” then have we got the project for you!<var 17 /var>The Euhedron restoration is set to begin shortly! Crystal enthusiasts, we need you now more than ever!

My word, look at that shine! The Euhedron restoration is complete! Our researchers can now begin a thorough analysis of its systems.<var 17 /var>Alas, we'll require a good deal of time and effort for it to fully function again... But the data that rests within will be worth the wait, I'm sure!<var 17 /var>To whet your appetite for delightful, delicious data until then, Reportingway has plenty to share in the Infrastructure Index!

With such a wealth of relics and rare minerals to ship to Etheirys for analysis, we're going to need a bigger cosmoport!<var 17 /var>You know the drill─supplies and stellar missions will be paramount to our success!
We've ironed out our cosmoport renovation plans, so expect construction to begin soon! If you're eager to start building, stay tuned for further instructions!

Ah, I love the smell of a freshly remodeled cosmoport! With renovations complete, we can now ship additional goods to Etheirys for research!<var 17 /var>Of course, more research means more discoveries regarding those that came before us on Oizys. Oh, the things we might learn!<var 17 /var>I'm also getting word we have a lovely new entry in the Infrastructure Index ready to pore over, courtesy of Reportingway. Huzzah!

Subterranean ruins have been discovered in Emerald Echoes! If they're well-preserved, this could be a monumental discovery!<var 17 /var>Excavation plans are underway as we speak, but the research team will require all the stellar mission contributions they can get!
The Emerald Echoes excavation project shall soon commence! If you aren't fazed by several tonzes of intergalactic dirt, come join us!

Emerald Echoes update─a possible entrance to the ruin has been found! Dylise is investigating further.<var 17 /var>Keen to learn more? Reportingway has authored a detailed report for the Infrastructure Index!

The mystery of the sealed ruins door has been solved─the dim crystals flanking it are our keys to entry!<var 17 /var>An analysis back home revealed that Oizys-sourced minerals could be used as catalysts to revitalize these crystals!<var 17 /var>As you might expect, we'll need a surfeit of supplies for these next steps, so don't dally on those stellar missions!
We'll soon be knocking on Emerald Echoes's door, and this time, we intend to get an answer! Come join us─it's only a hop away on the Cosmoliner!

After much trial and error, the door to Emerald Echoes is open! What secrets lie beyond? Only one way to find out!<var 17 /var>With the crystals' sheen also restored, our researchers are champing at the bit to scrutinize their every facet!<var 17 /var>But for those who'd prefer <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to stare agog at crystals, you can read Reportingway's new Infrastructure Index entry instead!

Excellent news for the crystal appreciators out there─we've found another crystalline apparatus in the ruins!<var 17 /var>Reactivating it could give us a better understanding of its original purpose, but such an undertaking will, of course, require stellar mission contributions!
We'll soon be ready to breathe life back into the ruins' crystalline apparatus. If you've the paws to participate, come on down!

A very good morning to the Guide Stone, awake after ages of slumber! With its technologies at our disposal, the ruins' depths are ours to explore!<var 17 /var>Not only does this apparatus control the ruins, but our researchers posit that it may be linked to several bases across Oizys as well!<var 17 /var>Reportingway's summed up our findings in the Infrastructure Index. I recommend you give it a gander!

The crystalline terminal in the ruins' depths bears a striking resemblance to the Euhedron before its revitalization.<var 17 /var>Based on our previous undertakings, we should have no trouble bringing this one back from the brink!<var 17 /var>...Well, aside from the usual supplies, that is. Ready to aid us with some stellar missions, everyone?
It's almost time to begin work on the apparatus at Emerald Echoes. Crystal connoisseurs, I know you're out there! We have need of you once more!

It's alive! Alive, I tell you! The Metahedron looks good as new, and its information banks were perfectly preserved─a fortuitous development!<var 17 /var>Expect plenty of new data in the coming days! This could potentially aid our progress with the Euhedron, as well...<var 17 /var>For those who couldn't join us, don't fret! Reportingway's summarized this project in the Infrastructure Index!
Our engineers are presently dreaming up a subterranean Cosmoliner extension! Let's support them with stellar missions and keep those dreams alive!
Wonderful news─your support for the subterranean Cosmoliner extension has enabled us to begin construction! We'll let you know the moment it's ready for traversal!

We're overjoyed to announce that the Cosmoliner now stretches underground to Emerald Echoes!<var 17 /var>I see even more efficient analyses of the area in our future! Oooh, I do so love efficiency...<var 17 /var>Speaking of, the newest entry of the Infrastructure Index is already complete and awaiting your perusal! Industrious as ever, that Reportingway!

Attention, apparatus afficionados! I'm told that we may be able to utilize the Metahedron's aetheric information banks to restore the Euhedron!<var 17 /var>Unlike our predecessors, however, we haven't the technology to synchronize these devices... At least, not <var 1A 02 /var>yet<var 1A 01 /var>!<var 17 /var>So let's build a device that'll do just that! First, we must fortify Terra Firma to handle such a contraption... Stellar missions, anyone?
Construction on Terra Firma is nearly ready to commence! Enjoy the base in its current state while you can─it won't look like this much longer!

Huzzah! Terra Firma is now firmer than ever! With these extra enhancements, we're nearly set to build our aetheric resonance device!<var 17 /var>Once we do, we'll be able to recover all manner of invaluable information from Emerald Echoes... We're closing in on a major breakthrough!<var 17 /var>But before I get too carried away, I mustn't forget to mention Reportingway's newest Infrastructure Index entry! Let's give it a read, shall we?

The time is come, everyone─our next goal is to construct the aetheric resonance device and reboot the Euhedron!<var 17 /var>Countless ancient secrets sleep beneath those glimmering facets... And it's high time we uncovered them!<var 17 /var>Oooh, I'm so excited, I feel like I might just hop through the atmosphere! ...But I mustn't! We've supplies to procure and stellar missions to undertake!
This is it, my friends! We'll soon begin our efforts to reboot the Euhedron! We'll need everyone's help for this last push, so come join us when we're ready!

Success, thy name is the Orthostat Tower! With its aetheric resonance network at the ready, I daresay the base is as complete as it'll ever be!<var 17 /var>At long last, we'll be able to awaken the Euhedron's true potential! I extend my sincerest thanks to you all for your diligent efforts!<var 17 /var>If you'd like to reflect on this grand achievement, Reportingway's newest Infrastructure Index entry awaits!

It's been a long and gravitationally unstable road, but we've made incredible progress on Oizys! A hearty thank you to one and all for their contributions!<var 17 /var>We of the initiative shall continue to follow in the footsteps of our predecessors... And I hope you'll be there to join us along the way!
Readings show the distortion values have fallen to half strength. Keep up the good work!
Warning! A massive gravity sphere has manifested in the field!
The primary distortion is weakening! Fluctuations in the gravity readings are beginning to even out!
The sphere has lost significant mass. One last concerted push, and it should dissipate entirely!
Well done! It appears the sphere has been dispersed.
Collect as much floatstone as possible! Let's reach that quota!
Keep at it! Every sphere you disperse weakens the effect of the distortions.
Attention all personnel! Distortion values are spiking. Stay vigilant for new anomalies!
The bubble bloom is predicted to abate shortly. Keep a steady pace and attend to your respective missions while conditions persist!
Thanks to the hard work of all our contributors, we have successfully secured a bounty of rare resources! The red alert has been lifted.
The bubble bloom is predicted to abate shortly. Although we did fall short of our ideal resource quota, your efforts are greatly appreciated! This red alert is no longer in effect.
We suspect this giant orb is the source of the anomaly. Focus every effort upon its immediate dissipation!
Analyzing the composition of collected floatstones has allowed us to detect an immense deposit of the material in the skies above!
Another gigantic floatstone has been detected!
Maneuver your vacuum suit over the mech marker and activate its attractor beam!
A powerful gravitational anomaly has manifested at the Shielding Wall, causing field equipment to float into the air and interfere with our exploration efforts.
Portable gravity generators are proving effective at anchoring the equipment, but there is a shortage of available components. Contributions of generator parts are urgently requested.
We also have reports regarding another incident related to this anomaly.
The disruption has extended into Terra Firma itself, with a supply container floating skywards to such extreme altitudes that retrieval is no longer possible.
A large quantity of materials essential to rover maintenance has been lost as a result, and procuring replacements is now a top priority!
Thanks to everyone's diligent efforts, we have secured sufficient maintenance materials. Reserve supplies are still being gratefully accepted on site.
Our depository at the Shielding Wall has collected sufficient supplies to resolve the floating equipment issue. Your contributions are much appreciated!
Spheres of seawater have risen above Cape Geras, resulting in bubble bloom conditions and a dramatic surge in humidity across the entire region.

Following this occurrence, a grove of moisture-craving trees was observed rapidly sprouting at the Foregone Oasis. Lend a hand to help harvest this promising resource while the vegetation remains exposed aboveground!
The bubble bloom also presents us with an additional opportunity.

A field researcher at the Sound Pole has reported the discovery of drifting bubbles containing metallic coral. It is theorized that the bloom phenomenon has lifted matter from the ocean deeps along with the seawater itself.
Secure specimens of this metal-infused coral that we might further our studies into coastal environments and botanical distribution.
We have collected sufficient specimens for further botanical studies. Any surplus samples will be gladly accepted at the Sound Pole depository.
The harvest at the Foregone Oasis has been plentiful! Thanks to your assistance, we have a bounty of this new resource to process and put to practical use.
Gravitational fluctuations wreaking havoc with atmospheric pressure have given rise to gale-force winds! One such violent gust has overturned a rover carrying vital supplies.
The tempest has since spent its strength, so we ask for volunteers to make haste to the incident site to help restore order and replace the ruined stock of pananoodles!
We also have reports regarding another wind-related incident.
A flight of drones carrying archaeological fragments has crash-landed in the pond east of the Megalithopolis after being buffeted by violent crosswinds.
We ask that workers hasten to the area to assist with retrieving fragments from the water, as well as contribute supplies for the delicate on-site restoration of muddied relics!
The retrieval of relics from the pond east of the Megalithopolis is proceeding smoothly. Thanks to your diligent efforts, we expect the incident to be resolved without further issue.
We are still accepting surplus contributions, but the crisis involving the overturned rover and ruined pananoodles is otherwise resolved. Thank you for your swift action!
Gale-force winds arising from gravitationally agitated atmospheric pressures have caused a catastrophic rockfall in the south of the Long-lost Carrot!
With the howling gusts now easing off, we request assistance with removing the rocky debris. Skilled miners are also in demand to help extract a rare ore discovered in the chunks of fallen outcrop.
We also have reports regarding another wind-related incident.
Workers on the Regolift have sustained serious injuries after the area was buffeted by the recent cyclonic gusts. Due to the scale of the incident, medicinal materials are running dangerously low.
On-site physicians warn that the wounded are still being brought in, and urgently request delivery of emergency treatment supplies!
The incident site now reports a generous surfeit of medical supplies. The physicians─and their patients─thank you for your timely deliveries.

Thanks to your enthusiastic cooperation, our rockfall crew has more than enough supplies to finish clearing the debris. We also thank our volunteer miners for procuring such copious quantities of rare ore. Excellent work!
協力可能な技術を持つ者は、至急現場に向かってくれたまえ！ 続けて、乱重力に関する別件の報告だ。
This is not a drill! We call upon all personnel with the requisite skill sets to respond immediately!
協力可能な技術を持つ者は、至急現場に向かってくれたまえ！ 続けて、水泡嵐に関する別件の報告だ。
協力可能な技術を持つ者は、至急現場に向かってくれたまえ！ 続けて、暴風に関する別件の報告だ。
We call upon all personnel with the requisite skill sets to respond immediately!
Sprig Cleaning

Slice away at irregular leafkin and reap the rewards!
あっ、あれがツヨツヨ・トラップですぅ～！ そこかしこの会場でお邪魔になっていて……！
行く手を阻んでいた草むらが消えたぞッ！ 魔物を全て刈ったことで周囲への影響が薄れたか……先へ進もう！
ひときわ目立つエレガントな変異種ちゃんがいるねェ！ あの子も刈ってみてもらえるだろうか……！？
ン～フフ、キミがそんな特別な力を得られるとは……！ もしまた現れたら、ぜひとも逃さずに刈ってくれたまえッ！
エッグハント・ガーデンサイズを使って、 ひとつ残らず、刈りつくしてください！
草刈り達成
ここが綺麗になれば、ひとまずの催し会場は確保できそう……！ もうひと踏ん張り、よろしくお願いしますぅ～！
